name: through the eyes of another
description:
the main idea was to show what it life is like for someone living with autism, ADHD and dyslexia. however this is only a demo and really on shows the ADHD side of things as i ran out of time and my skills are that good haha, anyways, hope you enjoy. 

what is needing to be added:
